comment.author: 46578719@N07
comment._content: If you are referring here to the wife of Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek,  Remember Chiang is the surname, Kai-shek is his given name. In western  custom, he is Mr. Kai-shek Chiang. Is the person above Madame Chiang?

comment.author: 69202911@N05
comment._content: I believe the person on the left is Vice Squadron Leader James H. Howard, AVG.  Howard would later be awarded the Congressional Medal of Honor for actions taken while flying a P-51B Mustang in Europe while escorting B-17s.
